# [Interview #71: ACOS Signing Report - Lara Beaton, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=71#4)

#### Robert Jordan

Ogier: Were not genetically engineered (blew Greebs' looney Longing-taint theory away).
